LICENSES & CERTIFICATION.Name: Shotokan Karate: Purple belt with formal training over 8 years

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Post-Disaster Situation Analyses and Resource Management Using Delay-tolerant Peer-to-Peer Wireless Network (DiSARM), IIM Calcutta
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Professor: Somprakash Bandyopadhyay (Managament Information System, IIM Calcutta)
Objective: 
•	To develop a framework that includes social media feeds to obtain situational information
•	To developing a model for need assessment and a strategy efficient, optimal resource allocation 
        system
•	To build an annotated people and resource map
Job Description:
•	Tweet annotation: Extraction, analysis and segmentation of post disaster situational tweets 
        regarding the Nepal earthquake of 2015, by interactive information crowd-sourcing, crowd 
        engagement and decision making. 
•	Process Automation:  Designing a robust algorithm which will function during real time natural 
        disaster situations in future by extracting valuable tweets and identifying their corresponding 
        authors
